page.title: 06Playground Activities.
page.content: Marbles is a game and these are the rules. If you hit the marble you have it. You have a marble and someone has a marble too. You have to hit it, but if it only moves a little bit it is called 'tips'. When you don't want it to carry on rolling you ask for 'stops'. If the person has to go in and then does not bring it back out with him or her they have to go and fetch it and give it to you. When you have lost, if you don't think that you lost fairly then you play the game again. If a shot is taken unfairly it has to be taken again. When you want to finish a game and get your lunch or something, you give the person another marble in assurance that you will play the game again after.
